Text.Page:
You've done well to get this far, but things are about to get much more difficult.

Beyond this point is the Garden of Yativio, the king of corpse flowers. It is a powerful creature, grown even stronger from feeding off the power of the rift.

If you insist on forging ahead, I have one piece of advice:
Be careful when Yativio's body glows red.

May the gods show you mercy.
